part.Name: SnackOnDrink
part.message: The brine stings your mouth and fills your breath with lake air.

part.Name: PoisonOnDrink
part.Message: You feel poison course through your veins!

part.Name: AccomplishmentOnDrink
part.muralText: For reasons kept secret by the sphinx of subjective experience, =name= drank the forbidden tea.
part.gospelText: While traveling through =player.zone.name=, =name= stopped at a tavern in =landmark.nearest=. There =player.subjective= lost a bet and bashfully drank a dram of lava. Miraculously, =player.subjective= left the tavern unharmed.

part.Name: DiseaseOnGoingProne
part.Message: Putrid ooze splashes into your mouth. You gag at the awful taste.

part.Name: HydrateOnDrink
part.Message: You feel the soup slosh around your stomach.

part.Name: HydrateOnDrink
part.Message: You flush with the warming draught!

part.Name: GlitchOnPour
part.messageZone: The space around you starts to glitch.
part.accomplishmentObject: You poured the raw entropy of the universe onto things and caused them to glitch into other things.
part.accomplishmentZone: You poured the raw entropy of the universe on the ground and caused the space around you to glitch.
